name: Smart City Dashboard
description: Smart City Dashboard is a simulation project created by the SCD team! In this isometric city builder, you are given the tools to outfit your city with smart devices. Using the dashboard, you can monitor these devices and use them to improve the design of your city, respond to events, and change systems real time! This simulation also has immersing features such as one to allow you to experience your city from the perspective of one of its inhabitants.
